name: Pizza Delivery (MutantGenes)
description:
Pizza Delivery is a basic, silly platformer game that features a yellow pizza-delivery boy who attempts to distribute pizza to all his customers. Along the way, he will encounter enemies (such as annoying mice or massive boss sheep) and hazardous booby traps (like fire and poison rain). The delivery boy (AKA the player) must use their wits and the resources provided to overcome these challenges.  Everyone must get a pizza!

(Additional instructions are included in the game.)

Mechanics in this game include:

  •  an inventory with selectable items
  • the ability to pick up items
  • weapons (sword and bow & arrow)
  • "place-able" items (eg. planks and boxes)

DISCLAIMER: This game is not good due to the fact that it was created by a 9th grader who is just beginning to learn about video game development. The game consists of 4 levels and is fairly short.

Have fun! Feedback is appreciated.
